divs: sighting detailsi am not the witness of this event. i was told by 2 women who saw it & are basically terrified to say too much as they also saw 2 mib in a black vehicle observing the craft and noticed that they were watching the craft. thia happened aprx 2 weeks ago. originally female # 1 (mid 40s caucasian) pulled into a gas station on needles highway where she saw a black triangle very far up in the sky. she went into he store & asked the clerk if she had seen the craft. the clerk was black & told female #1 that she & her husband had seen it the night before. female #1 went out & 2 other men she knew were outside looking @ the craft. it was coming down out of the sky closer to the ground. female #1 drove over to female #2's house, (caucasian & mid 60s). both are devout christian & the #2 does not necessarily believe in ufos. the house is closer to the colorado river. #2 watched the craft with #1 & then got her binoculars out. #2 told #1 that it was spinning over the river changing shape, changing colors turning into a cirlce then it turned in a flat line nearly swimming in the sky & then turned into a sort of sting ray shape & then a cigar shape. she said it swam thru the sky & weaved in & out of the mountains. #2 said that at one point she saw a man in a canoe near their house looking @ the shape & then @ them. he did not have a fishing pool. then #2 saw a car about 1\2 mile away on a dirt road on the river bank. @ men in suits got out & took something out of the trunk of the car & put it on the roof of the car. she said then she saw them look @ her which scared her. then she said the craft turned into a triangle & started to come towards the house & she said she saw it split in to two parts. at this point both women went inside too afraid to remain outside. during the night helicopters drove over the house & shined lights all over the river & river bank. if you want to do further invest on this i can put you in communication with the witnesses. these people are a bit freaked out as am i & it takes a lot to freak me out. pls email me & let me know how i can contact you & discuss this. qed
